        public static final int GET_LOCAL_ORIENTATION

      • GET_ABSOLUTE_POSITION_AND_ORIENTATION

        public static final int GET_ABSOLUTE_POSITION_AND_ORIENTATION
        retrieves the absolute object positions and orientations (as Euler angles) (in floatData. There are 6 values for each object (x,y,z,alpha,beta,gamma)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GET_LOCAL_POSITION_AND_ORIENTATION

        public static final int GET_LOCAL_POSITION_AND_ORIENTATION
        retrieves the local object positions and orientations (as Euler angles) (in floatData. There are 6 values for each object (x,y,z,alpha,beta,gamma)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GET_LINEAR_VELOCITY

        public static final int GET_LINEAR_VELOCITY
        retrieves the object linear velocity (in floatData. There are 3 values for each object (vx,vy,vz))
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GET_ANGULAR_VELOCITY

        public static final int GET_ANGULAR_VELOCITY
        retrieves the object angular velocity as Euler angles per seconds (in floatData. There are 3 values for each object (dAlpha,dBeta,dGamma))
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GET_LINEAR_AND_ANGULAR_VELOCITY

        public static final int GET_LINEAR_AND_ANGULAR_VELOCITY
        retrieves the object linear and angular velocity (in floatData. There are 6 values for each object (vx,vy,vz,dAlpha,dBeta,dGamma))
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
